website_summaries.verdict: Mostly cotton with a hint of Spandex, these stylish joggers are well-made and fashionable.
cons: Sizing runs large/long, according to some buyers
This could be due to less-specific sizing (S, M, L, XL)

customer_reviews.title: GREAT QUALITY!!! My son's favorite pants!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my 13 yr old son. He has to wear uniforms for school and these were allowed. Have to say he is the pickiest child when it comes to clothes and these QUICKLY became his favs!! Also have to say he's a little on the small side and these fit Great! Also wanna say color was as expected and where he wears them SO much I have washed them about 75 times (yes I'm Slow to review) they have held their original color and shape, altho I do not put them in the dryer. Jyst wanted to add that which for kid's clothes I think is important
customer_reviews.author: lili

customer_reviews.title: Image is misleading. Elastic and drawstring are non-functional
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these, in two different sizes thinking that since they are elastic plus drawstring, we could make them work. Also thinking we'd save the next size up until he grew to that size. However, the waist has very little give--almost zero stretch--and the drawstring is just decoration. It's a string sewed in at that one spot. I'm not happy. Misleading. The pants are a cool color and nice fabric, but they might as well be a fixed waist size. I would like to return them, I missed the window and I don't know how to contact the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Leanne S

customer_reviews.title: Cheap don't buy way to big not for boys for men
customer_reviews.text: These pants are not for big kids they are for men. They are cheap and way to big I would not recommend buy or waiting your money on them I got a size 14 for my 9 year old because that's the size he is that fit my dad that's 6 foot. They are not worth the money at all. I buy everything from Amazon. So I'm not a first time buyer and just up set you could buy better at Walmart for less money...
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size
customer_reviews.text: The overall look and feel of the pant was good. They even arrived timely, however the size was very large. My son is on the smaller size but wears a true 10-12. The length was just too long. It seems as though he would have needed a size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: LUV2READ

customer_reviews.title: Love these for school uniforms
customer_reviews.text: Love these for school uniforms! I ordered these pants in both medium and large as my grandson is just starting to grow out of size medium. They seem to run a little big and I ended up keeping the size medium for him. Very nice look and there's a little flex to the fabric which makes them very comfortable for a long day at school. Also, they come in several neutral colors to make it easy for him to pair with whatever color shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Quigley

customer_reviews.title: My 9 year old loves them
customer_reviews.text: He’s skinny and lengthy so I originally ordered the 10, his normal size. WAY TOO big, they seemed more like 14. Returned and bought the size 8 which were still a little big but manageable. Not the best material as it faded with the first wash, but my son loves these jogger pants. Material is also a little stiff, but that’s because it’s thick. Good for active boys who usually get that rip in the knee.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: He's a 12 slim and they fit him perfect. He loves them
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the medium for my extremely particular Grandson. He's a 12 slim and they fit him perfect. He loves them. Ordered another color, too.
customer_reviews.author: Violet Rose

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Got these thinking they had a draw string to adjust the waist cuz my son is a size 10 length but an 8 in the waist, but come to find out it's a fake draw string. You can't tighten them at all. The elastic isnt really elastic either so unless you're the perfect size for these they wont fit. Total waste of money unless my son gains tons of weight quickly.
customer_reviews.author: J.D.

customer_reviews.title: He likes them so...
customer_reviews.text: My son feels a lot more comfortable with this type of pants. During winter he didn't complaint about feeling cold like he usually would with regular uniform pants, and if would've there's plenty of room to wear thermos without feeling constricted. If my son is happy, then I'm loving them.
customer_reviews.author: Jeeniejolie

customer_reviews.title: Well made and soft. Waist runs LARGE.
customer_reviews.text: Well made, soft material. These have an elastic waistband with a tie in front. The tie is purely decorative. The waist is huge compared to other similar pants for boys. If my child had a larger belly, or the tie actually adjusted the waist these would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jan E. Mackey

customer_reviews.title: Misleading color
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the joggers but the color is totally different!
customer_reviews.author: Sue de Santis

customer_reviews.title: One came in wrong color..
customer_reviews.text: Only 2 stars because I ordered 2 of these pants for my 2 sons for our family photo shoot and the colors are NOT the same!! I’m debating if I should order again to see if we get the actual color we wanted. I ordered the color on the left (tobacco), but the other pants came in khaki/light brownish. As far as the product itself, they run big. But I like it, very nice. Just bummed that one pants came in the wrong color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These pants have a fake drawstring!
customer_reviews.text: These pants are of good material and quality. The 2 star rating comes because these pants have a fake drawstring. Like is it there for decoration? It doesn’t make sense and I had to return them because my son needs to be able to tighten his joggers because he’s slim but tall and needs the XL length.
customer_reviews.author: GBo

customer_reviews.title: Great pants, they ended up being too large
customer_reviews.text: Great pants, they ended up being too large, so we returned and got a size smaller. It is SO nice to find boys pants that fit. Many boys clothes are too small for 11-12 year olds, so it's nice to find some pants that he can wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Run big
customer_reviews.text: Thick and durable material. My son ssys they are soft and comfy. They run a little big and did not shrink in the wash. I kept them though because they are just slightly big, but still look good and are comfortable. Just a little baggier than typical joggers.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Good

customer_reviews.title: Huuuuuuge
customer_reviews.text: Huuuuuuge. My son is an average 10/12, these fit like a men’s small around the waist. Wouldn’t be an issue, but they do not adjust or have loops for a belt. He cannot wear these.
customer_reviews.author: Darcy

customer_reviews.title: Runs big
customer_reviews.text: These pants run very big. The size small (8) fits my 12 year old boy who is 72 lbs. he is very lean but normally wears a 10 in pants. Size down for sure. The waist is big but the draw string works well. These are good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Franky

customer_reviews.title: Runs big.
customer_reviews.text: They were larger than expected, my kids are still growing so that's ok. But my 10 yr old can fit into the size 8 (slightly tight) and he normally wears a size 12.
customer_reviews.author: Emily McMurray

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice pants. I got a size 14 for my son who is 11. It actually worked well because the cotton content is high and they shrank quite a bit after going through the washer and dryer.However ,there is still some room to grow in them.
customer_reviews.author: A. Severin

customer_reviews.title: This pants are really good quality, but I bought this for my son ...
customer_reviews.text: This pants are really good quality, but I bought this for my son size extra large and I always buy him big boys pants. This fitted my husband instead. And they were a little big on him as well. So I have no idea why they’re are named big boys!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pants
customer_reviews.text: Fits my almost 11 year old who fits in a size 12 comfortably. He is slender but tall. Would order again.
customer_reviews.author: njdames

customer_reviews.title: They run a size bigger
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the same size of all other pants and only this one was too large.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Menard

customer_reviews.title: Great! Durable! Color Holds.
customer_reviews.text: Great for school! Wash them about twice a week and they hold up for about half a year which is more than any other uniform pant my son has ever used. Price is affordboe so no concerns to replace half way thru the year.
customer_reviews.author: Idalmis Cordero

customer_reviews.title: Runs very large
customer_reviews.text: These are nice pants but I exchanged for smaller size twice and STILL couldn't get a pair that fit. These run REALLY big, but they look like decent pants.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Ann

customer_reviews.title: So comfy
customer_reviews.text: 12 year old loves these! Said it’s soft and he can move and be active. It stretches, he wears it a lot, need to get more.
customer_reviews.author: Baby Gilliyan Boutique

customer_reviews.title: Great pant
customer_reviews.text: These fit perfect for my kiddo. He loves them so much I’ll be ordering more in different colors. They’re loose but not too loose like a lot of the joggers tend to be.
customer_reviews.author: TheLastUnicorn

customer_reviews.title: Runs very big
customer_reviews.text: Way too big! My son wears an 8-10 and we ordered small - tag even said 8 on it and these swallowed him. So sad! They don’t come in extra small so we just can’t make these work.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla M

customer_reviews.title: No belt loops no draw string
customer_reviews.text: Love the style fit cut and color for my son and he does as well big con tho no belt loops and the drawstring is fake because of this I ended upbuying another item skinny clip (amazongproduct) and now they are my sons favorite pant
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Daum

customer_reviews.title: School Jogger
customer_reviews.text: Great quality!! They really hold up in color and are durable. I paid less than $10 which was an awesome bargain!!
customer_reviews.author: Rensol20

customer_reviews.title: Teen Fashion Pant 14 yo boys
customer_reviews.text: My 14 yo grandsons picked these out and he loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Lemp

customer_reviews.title: Great fit but fades easily in the wash
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and comfortable material but it fades easily in the wash
customer_reviews.author: Stacy R.

customer_reviews.title: Huge
customer_reviews.text: My son is 11, soon to be 12. He normally wears a 10 regular or a 10/12. I ordered 2 pair of pants in a 10/12 and they are huge he has enough space to fit another child in them around the waist. Pants are great quality. I almost dont want to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: Lady P

customer_reviews.title: Short pants
customer_reviews.text: My 13yr old son is 5’7 the pants fit in the waist, but way to short.
customer_reviews.author: Rissa

customer_reviews.title: These pants are great!! I've bought them in 5 different colors ...
customer_reviews.text: These pants are great!! I've bought them in 5 different colors for my grandson. Not too tight, but not sloppy either. Colors to match anything! Good price for durable pants, especially if you're tired of denim.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: Good product. My son who is 95 lbs normally wears youth L - xL... fit best in the youth medium.
customer_reviews.author: DaisyMae Purdy

customer_reviews.title: The waist is ridiculously big
customer_reviews.text: What in the world!!?? These pants were amazing when taken out of the package. Great material. Shape looked perfect. My son tried them on (he’s 11 and wears a 10/12) and the legs were fine but I could have fit a whole other person in the waist. I can’t believe the waist is this big and not adjustable. So weird. Too bad because these would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: kristen m slead

customer_reviews.title: Son prefers these as uniform pants
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as uniform pants for my son. He loves them. Ordered in black too. Nice fit too.
customer_reviews.author: reader

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable. Trendy. Quality.
customer_reviews.text: The pants are well made with quality material. I was worried that the color may be a little off as I’ve seen in other brands but, they were the perfect navy blue. My 6 year old loves his joggers. I’ll be ordering more. Ordering a size down though—they run big.
customer_reviews.author: !Deethat'sMe!

customer_reviews.title: Good looking pants but be aware of the sizes.
customer_reviews.text: Too big for my son but the quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: jwo

customer_reviews.title: Grandson wants this style again this year!
customer_reviews.text: Great product with a reasonable price! My 13 year old grandson loves them! I ordered these for him when he was 12 and then, again, for school clothes at the age of 13!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size
customer_reviews.text: My son is 7 tall and slender. This item was definitely not true to size. They are sized for thicker kids. Not even with the pull string did it fit, he still looked like he was swimming in them. If your child is skinny don’t order.
customer_reviews.author: des

customer_reviews.title: ... only want to wear joggers and these are his favorite pant.
customer_reviews.text: My son now only want to wear joggers and these are his favorite pant.
customer_reviews.author: Villie

customer_reviews.title: Great uniform pants
customer_reviews.text: These pants are true to size. We got a size medium (10-12) and he usually wears 12. Thry are a little big, but he is skinny as a twig.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit, Wrong Color
customer_reviews.text: Pants fit great, but color was too dark. My son needs khaki pants for his school uniform and these were much darker than the picturez
customer_reviews.author: Camo1102

customer_reviews.title: Fake drawstring
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with the new fake drawstring!!! I bought a pair of these pants last year and the drawstring was a real drawstring and my son loved them . The 2 new pair a just bought not so much the waist is too big and he can not tighten them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old son LOVES these pants. They are his first jogger style pant. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Liz and Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Well made casual pants
customer_reviews.text: Well made as shown, casual, twill type pants Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Sues

customer_reviews.title: Great school pant.
customer_reviews.text: My boys really like these as part of their required school dress code.
customer_reviews.author: tlm2012

customer_reviews.title: Extra waistline
customer_reviews.text: For slim, the waistline is very big/but the legs fit good. Wish they had an adjustable waist
customer_reviews.author: Shelly S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice that the string is actually functional and not just ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made and my son loves them. Nice that the string is actually functional and not just there for looks.
customer_reviews.author: Brittanie

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these pants! I buy them for my son because he’s inbetween sizes and the drawstring is perfect! And they are so stylish!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Clopton

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value. He's worn the previous pair for a year & they're still presentable, just too small.
customer_reviews.author: JTerhune

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the fabric.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves these pants as part of his school uniform. He currently wears a 16, but the fit of the 18 should carry him through the next year. Quality is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndys

customer_reviews.title: Really nice product
customer_reviews.text: My little one works these puppies hard and they still look great.
customer_reviews.author: Mink

customer_reviews.title: easy to slip on and great for school and casual
customer_reviews.text: easy to slip on and great for school and casual events
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Way big
customer_reviews.text: Nice but my son's husker and theses were still too big
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Check size chart
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these, had to get the XL as he is tall and thin, he normally wears MED. They look great and feel very durable. He's been wearing them now for 2 weeks so I hope they last for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Dana S. Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Joggers are the new hot topic and my kids love them. Fit great and we'll made
customer_reviews.text: Joggers are the new hot topic and my kids love them. Fit great and we'll made, light weight for all year wear.
customer_reviews.author: Lateasha R.

customer_reviews.title: He is 12 and generally a large is a good fit for him
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these pants. They do run quite large -- the first pair we ordered were a large. He is 12 and generally a large is a good fit for him. However they were huge and we returned them for a medium. The medium fits great and he wants me to order more.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: He's 10 but slim and they fit great. Not too big or small
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them. I got him a small. He's 10 but slim and they fit great. Not too big or small.
customer_reviews.author: Stef

customer_reviews.title: Must Have!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and fit. Can be casual or dressed up. My son loved these
customer_reviews.author: antoinette ferraro

customer_reviews.title: Very conferting
customer_reviews.text: I like that it fits as expected and very confertable
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected!
customer_reviews.text: On point with the color, comfortable all day wear, and warmth!
customer_reviews.author: Deshona Boykins

customer_reviews.title: Nice pants, great price
customer_reviews.text: Nice pants, great price, but they do run pretty large. Large in these pants is easily an XL in other kids pants.
customer_reviews.author: Chris W.

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Good value, used to purchase Joggers from tillys and they were much more overpriced
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: My son loves them
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these pants and they fit him perfect.
customer_reviews.author: samantha gomez

customer_reviews.title: Bought these for my son and he loved them! They fit true to size
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son and he loved them! They fit true to size. Will be ordering in more colors :)
customer_reviews.author: Kat M.

customer_reviews.title: good length and fits
customer_reviews.text: My son is a bigger boy and hard to fit .. good length and fits well
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected. My son wears a 12 and ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected. My son wears a 12 and they are little long, but he will grow into them by the start of school.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: I ordered boys xl and got men's xl. Unfortunately ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered boys xl and got men's xl. Unfortunately I sent them to my grandson in North Dakota and I live in Tennessee. My daughter procrastinates so he won't get his birthday present that fits!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I guess I can grow into then!? I ordered small you gave me large...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well made with good quality material. The pants were exactly as pictured. I'll be ordering a few more pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca J

customer_reviews.title: My son likes these. He likes the jogger style ...
customer_reviews.text: My son likes these. He likes the jogger style, but finds these to be just a little large around his calf. Keepers though!
customer_reviews.author: Love Saving Money

customer_reviews.title: Cool style, roomy fit
customer_reviews.text: Cool style, roomy fit, high quality, great price, fast shipping Too! Definitely ordering my son more colors, he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Summers

customer_reviews.title: I really like how these fit my son
customer_reviews.text: I wish they had them in Black! I really like how these fit my son!
customer_reviews.author: Broderick & Tiffany Brown

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great service, good quality, some size difference but still am pleased overall
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice pants and great quality. I will buy some more.
customer_reviews.author: Família Barragan

customer_reviews.title: Comfy Joggers
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the purchase. The product arrived exactly as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Shandra Hunt

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This product was way to big to fit my son who normally wears a 14 in pants.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of it but it sized way too big
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small sizing
customer_reviews.text: The pants are fine, good material, but run small. I have to order a new pair one size up and hope those will fit him.
customer_reviews.author: BLT

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 pants (2 L and 2 M) its fit big to my children but it was my mistake. Anyway, I gave 2 to my husband and 2 to my big boy so I am going to buy 2 more "size S". I like this pants , are comfortable, great quality an nice cut.
customer_reviews.author: Larisa Bentos Pereira

product_meta.title: Southpole Boys' Big Jogger Pants in Basic Stretch Twill Fabric
product_meta.description: Long jogger pants in basic stretch twill fabric and solid color
